question: What was the topic of best paper in 2012 EMNLP-CoNLL ?
query: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(DISTINCT t4.citingpaperid), t1.keyphraseid, t2.paperid FROM paper AS t2 JOIN cite AS t4 ON t2.paperid = t4.citedpaperid JOIN paperkeyphrase AS t1 ON t2.paperid = t1.paperid JOIN venue AS t3 ON t3.venueid = t2.venueid WHERE t2.year = 2012 AND t3.venuename = 'EMNLP-CoNLL' GROUP BY t2.paperid, t1.keyphraseid ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT t4.citingpaperid) DESC NULLS LAST
